ValidationRule.description: Required field final comments from manufacturer
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: if((ISPICKVAL( CMPL123CME__Type_of_Report__c ,'Combined initial and final report') || ISPICKVAL( CMPL123CME__Type_of_Report__c ,'Final report')) && (CMPL123CME__Final_Comments_of_Manufacturer__c = null || CMPL123CME__Final_Comments_of_Manufacturer__c = ''),true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This field value cannot be blank for this report type
